title: Libertas
description: Sorcerers and Humans have lived seperate existances since the infamous burning of witches. The Sorcerer Council have driven all magical creatures (nymphs, vampires, faeries, etc) out of society, slaughtering them to hide their secret existance from the Humans. Julian Kain hates society and will do everything to stop the killing of innocents. Enter Nicholai Demas, poster boy politician for the Council who harbours a very dark secret...Status: CompleteWord count: approx. 94,348
author: DesertRoseFallen
